articles.title: Welcome to my portfolio
articles.description: This website contains a collection of works done in SMU
articles.contents:
Visual Analytics
Three take-home exercises:
Graphs plotted using R

Two DataVis MakeOver assignments
Done using Tableau
Given a graph, critiques are made and improvements are
implemented.
Step by step guide on creating the new design.
Link for new design on Tableau Public is available.

Time Series Analysis
Meetup sessions conducted by Visual Analytics Professor. (update in progress)
Time series data exploratory using graphs
line graph, box plot, seasonal plot, seasonal subseries plot.

Finance
Group project for finance
Analysis of two stocks in Chinaâ€™s new energy market.
Presented financial statement analysis using excel and Tableau.
